mapper.select: SELECT mu.id AS id, mu.user_id AS userId, mu.is_read AS isRead, mu.handle_later AS handleLater, m.context AS context, m.schedule_id AS scheduleId, m.type AS type, m.create_time AS createTime, s.id AS scheduleId, s.title AS scheduleTitle, s.type AS scheduleType FROM wt_teamwork.wt_message_user mu INNER JOIN wt_teamwork.wt_message m ON mu.message_id = m.id INNER JOIN wt_teamwork.wt_schedule s ON m.schedule_id = s.id WHERE mu.user_id = #{userId} AND m.group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY m.create_time DESC
